channel.title: Animals on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Animals on ZooBerry

item.title: AGP - Armored Rhino
item.description: A mysterious armored rhino creature has been discovered in the lab, with no sign of Dr. Ricad.

item.title: AGP - Cotton the White Elephant
item.description: A genetically modified white elephant, affectionately named Cotton, was discovered in the abandoned Dr. Ricad’s Lab.

item.title: AGP - Fast Sheep
item.description: A genetically modified sheep discovered in Dr. Ricad’s Lab, providing key evidence in the mystery of Dr. Ricad’s disappearance.

item.title: AGP - Hulk the Wolf
item.description: A powerful genetically modified wolf, named The Hulk, was discovered in the lab trying to escape its cage.

item.title: Animals
item.description: Adopt new animals to share with your guests at home!

item.title: Beaver
item.description: The beaver is a semi-aquatic rodent known for its broad, flat tail and remarkable ability to cut down trees for building lodges and dams.

item.title: Dodo Bird
item.description: The Dodo, an extinct flightless bird from Mauritius, was driven to extinction in the late 1600s due to human activity and introduced predators.

item.title: Extinct
item.description: Prehistoric, ice age, recently-extinct all go here.

item.title: Fictional
item.description: Animals that only exist in the depths our imaginations.

item.title: Jawa
item.description: Jawas are desert scavengers who live in clans, alternating between sandcrawlers and fortified homes for protection. This mod is a preview of the StarWars Expansion Pack (SWEP).

item.title: Living
item.description: Animals that still roam the Earth today.

item.title: Moonwalking Giraffe
item.description: A whimsical giraffe that performs an impressive moonwalk, sure to amuse visitors.

item.title: Parma Wallaby
item.description: The Parma Wallaby (Macropus parma) is a herbivorous marsupial found in Eastern New South Wales, Australia, known for its hopping gait and use of a ‘5-legged’ posture when grazing.

item.title: Party Panda
item.description: A lively panda breed that loves music and dancing, bringing joy and energy to the exhibit.

item.title: Primeval Abyssal Pack
item.description: The Primeval Abyssal Pack includes prehistoric animals, statues, and the Primeval Abyssal Aquarium.

item.title: Reinhorse
item.description: The Reinhorse is a majestic flying horse that captivates visitors with its grace and beauty.

item.title: Star Wars Expansion Pack (SWEP)
item.description: The Star Wars Expansion Pack includes a Jawa, Ewok, Wookie, Wampa Ice Creature, and a new observation area object.

item.title: SWEP2
item.description: SWEP2 adds new Star Wars-themed content, including an updated Jawa, R2D2, Sandcrawler, and various statues and buildings.

item.title: Whooping Crane
item.description: The whooping crane (Grus americana) is a strictly protected bird in North America. Once reduced to only 15 individuals in 1937, conservation efforts have increased their numbers to around 320 worldwide, including captive populations.

item.title: Halloween Collab Pack 2024
item.description: A small collaboration pack from a few Zoo Tycoon 1 designers which adds in various items, foliage and animals in order to make your zoo feel a bit more seasonal.

item.title: Seekings of Depth
item.description: SeeKings of Depth is a mod pack that adds a variety of prehistoric sea creatures to Zoo Tycoon 1.

item.title: Abyssinian Ground Hornbill
item.description: Native to sub-Saharan Africa, this large ground-dwelling bird is known for its distinctive red throat pouch (blue in females) and powerful bill.

item.title: Addra Gazelle
item.description: Native to the Sahara Desert, this beautiful antelope once roamed the arid regions of North Africa. With its slender build and striking white and reddish-brown coat, the Addra Gazelle is perfectly adapted to desert life and an ideal addition to your desert or African savannah exhibits.

item.title: Adelie Penguin
item.description: Found along the entire Antarctic coast, Adelie Penguins are one of the most southerly distributed seabirds and are among the most widely spread penguin species. This addition allows you to create a realistic and immersive Antarctic exhibit, giving your guests a unique glimpse into the lives of these fascinating birds in their icy habitat!

item.title: African Civet
item.description: Native to sub-Saharan Africa, this large, nocturnal mammal is known for its striking black and white markings. A solitary and elusive creature, the African Civet spends its nights foraging under the cover of darkness. Add this fascinating species to your African exhibit, offering your guests a glimpse into the secretive world of nocturnal wildlife! Mod originally published on Hawkkeye666’s Google Drive and archived with his permission on ZooBerry.

item.title: African Fish Eagle
item.description: Native to sub-Saharan Africa, this large bird of prey is known for its striking plumage and powerful talons.

item.title: Abaco Barb
item.description: The Abaco Barb was a rare breed of horse that lived on Great Abaco Island in the Bahamas. It was known for its hardiness and small stature, standing between 13 and 14 hands high, with a muscular build.

item.title: Abanda Cave Crocodile
item.description: These dwarf crocodiles, native to the Abanda Caves in Gabon, Africa, have adapted to life in dark caves, feeding on cave-dwelling fish and bats.

item.title: Abbot's Duiker
item.description: Native to the dense forests of Central Africa, this small antelope species is known for its shy nature and unique appearance. This mod brings the Abbot’s Duiker to life with fully animated movements, creating an immersive and realistic experience for your visitors.

item.title: Abdim's Stork
item.description: Native to Africa, this small stork is known for its stunning black and white plumage, red facial markings, and social nature. Often found in large colonies in wetlands and grasslands, the Abdim’s Stork is the perfect addition to your African savannah exhibit.

item.title: Aberdeen Angus
item.description: Add one of the world’s most popular beef cattle breeds to your farm-themed exhibits with the Aberdeen Angus! This Scottish breed, originating from Aberdeenshire and Angus counties, is renowned for its hardiness, adaptability, and premium-quality beef.

item.title: Dinosaur Digs Marketing Beta Pack
item.description: A pack that converts content from the Dinosaur Digs marketing beta to the retail version of the game.

item.title: Mexico Natural Icons Pack
item.description: A pack containing five new animals, five new foliage items, and five new animated scenery items.

item.title: Leatherback Turtle
item.description: Adds the leatherback turtle (Dermochelys coriacea) to your aquariums and marine parks.

item.title: Unlimited Feather Overload (U.F.O.)
item.description: A new expansion pack full of prehistoric fluffy pals!!

item.title: Toadally Batrocious Land Invaders
item.description: A pack full of ancient amphibians for your zoos! This pack is a Halloween gift for all of you! Toadally Batrocious (TB) is the third of the “Works on Lacking Stuff” projects.

item.title: Mischievous Erradicators of Outside Wildlife (M.E.O.W.)
item.description: Dedicated to my two cat sisters, Vega & Rigel, whose birthday is on September 7th. Also dedicated to all cat lovers!

item.title: Ussuri Dhole
item.description: Adds the temperate dhole subspecies to your zoo, with a fox-like appearence and unique cooing sounds.

item.title: Bug Mayhem
item.description: A little expansion pack containing items for a full terrarium of arthropods!

item.title: Eoraptor
item.description: The Eoraptor is a small dinosaur from the Late Triassic period. It is one of the earliest dinosaurs known to science, and it is a basal sauropodomorph.

item.title: Peryton
item.description: Add the Peryton, a mythical creature that is part deer and part bird, to your zoo.

item.title: Hamadryas Baboon
item.description: Adds the striking and unique looking Hamadryas baboon for adoption.

item.title: Saola
item.description: Adds the rare and elusive Saola for adoption in your zoo.

item.title: Perentie
item.description: Perenties are fairly large lizards in the monitor family.

item.title: Nile Monitor
item.description: The Nile Monitor is a large, fast, and agile lizard from the rainforest outskirts and grasslands of Africa.
